transcript:
Customer: Aapka koi no call list hai?
Customer: Hmm?
Customer: No call hai aapki?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Haan abhi baat nahi hui hai ticket pe call kar rahi hu. Kar leti hu us pe call.
Customer: Are team wale pe hi karne bola.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi Mrityunjay sir very good afternoon kaise hai aap?
Customer: Sab theek hai. Kya hai bataiye.
Executive: Theek thaak kar rahi thi sir mai.
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: Riti baat kar rahi thi mai IndiaMART se.
Customer: Acha theek hai baad me call karo aur mai abhi thoda busy hu mai aap se wahi baad me baat kar paunga.
Executive: Kab tak baat ho payegi sir actually morning hi baat ki thi to 3 baje ka mujhe time diya tha aapki wife ne.
Customer: Haan baat kar lijiye 3 baje unko. Unse baat kijiye nahi baat.
Executive: To sir isi number pe to baat hui thi aapki wife se. Actually actually kal meri team se aapko call kiya tha Sudhanshu ne.
Customer: To aapne waha pe na note kar liya. Mai nahi kar sakta mai busy hu meeting karo na kab tak baat aap batao.
Executive: Sir ek time bataiye na kab call karu.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called the customer.

- Customer stated he is busy.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for a suitable time to call.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, call scheduling, busy
